p: The experiments were conducted at the Cell Genetics and Plant Biotechnology Laboratory (CGPBL), Department of Biotechnology and Genetic Engineering, Jahangirnagar University, Dhaka-1342, Bangladesh (23°53′14″ N 90°15′56″ E). Flowers of Krisnachura ( Delonix regia) Sonalu (Cassia fistula), and Jarul ( Lagerstroemia speciosa) were used as the experimental materials in this study. About 1.0 kg of each flower was collected from the Jahangirnagar University campus during May 2019.
